thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Scott Privette
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Scott Privette

author: Scott Privette
title: Scott Privette
text: I've made 2 purchases from the Natural Sapphire company for earrings and an engagement ring. My now wife loves them all! The blue sapphires match my eyes she always says. The quality and attention to detail that went into both pieces of jewelry were exquisite. I designed both from the website and they came out exactly like I wanted. The most surprising and pleasant part about purchasing jewelry from here was the constant attention and help I received from Caitlyn Perlman. We sent over 50 emails back and forth while I was trying to decide on the right ring. She was always quick to respond and gave great advice and information. My wife loves her ring thanks so much Caitlyn!
